plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is epic, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive, their favourite length is long, their favourite topic is mythology, their favourite pacing is slow, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are good vs. evil and the nature of reality. Additionally, it can be inferred that the user enjoys complex and well-developed characters, as well as intricate world-building and a rich mythology.
